articles.title: Ian Fang doesn't deny he dated Rebecca Lim, skirts question on when they broke up - AsiaOne
articles.description: For years, Rebecca Lim and Ian Fang had always maintained to the media that they are "just good friends" and not a former couple, despite the rumours. But now that the 35-year-old actress is marrying a corporate branding professional, Ian appeared to be singi…
articles.content:

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Singapore's Vaccinated Travel Lane with Malaysia: What you need to know - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The borders between Singapore and Malaysia will be reopened for quarantine-free travel at scale from Nov 29, for the first time since the Covid-19 pandemic began rapidly worsening in March last year.

articles.author: Sarmistha Neogy
articles.title: Joanne Peh says she was conned by contractor while renovating her house - AsiaOne
articles.description: Joanne Peh and her husband, Qi Yuwu, have been facing trouble in their house renovation work. Here's their story of struggle.
articles.content: Handling renovation contractors can sometimes be a pain, especially if you are the kind that pays attention to every little detail. If you’ve renovated your home or have had to deal with contractors … [+4340 chars]
